grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 啓発【ケイハツ】enlightenment, development, edification, public awareness, illumination, education, inspiration
拝啓【ハイケイ】Dear (so and so), Dear Sir, Dear Madam, To Whom It May Concern
敬啓【ケイケイ】salutation at the end of a formal letter
kun reading compounds: 啓く【ひらく】to enlighten, to edify
